News.headline: Tickets: Aldershot Town v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Tickets: Aldershot Town v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Tickets: Aldershot Town v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: Ticket information for the Daggers’ trip to the Aldershot Recreation Ground on Tuesday 21st March, 7:45pm KO
News.description:
Please note that this game will be pay on the day only and visiting supporters will be segregated in the South East Corner (Terrace) and The Bill Warren seats situated in the South Stand. All AWAY Supporters will enter the ground from the High Street end and access the stands through turnstile 4.

Ticket Prices:

Seated:
Adults - £19.00
Concessions (65+, Military personnel ID required) - £15.00
Student 16-21 (Student ID required) - £15.00
11-17 year olds - £7.00
Under 11's - FREE*

Terrace:
Adults - £17.00
Concessions (65+, Military personnel ID required) - £13.00
Student 16-21 (Student ID required) - £13.00
11-17 year olds - £5.00
Under 11's - FREE*

*Under 11's go free with a FULL paying Adult, maximum 2 x free Under 11 tickets per Adult.

Disabled/Wheelchair Information:
Disabled/Wheelchair tickets are £13.00 each while the carer goes free of charge, proof of eligibility for disabled ticket will be a requirement. Disabled /Carer tickets should be booked in advance via the Aldershot ticket office but if they arrive on the day those people need to purchase their ticket from the ticket office. For any wheelchair users there is limited spaces available and these tickets must be purchased in advance by calling 01252320211.
